0.6.0.description: Amxx Pawn language support in Atom

readme:
# Amxxpawn language support in Atom [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/SmileYzn/language-sourcepawn.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/SmileYzn/language-sourcepawn)
Adds syntax highlighting and syntax to Amxxpawn files in Atom.

Most of this is taken from the [C/C++](https://github.com/atom/language-c) and [Java](https://github.com/atom/language-java) Atom packages.

Forked from https://github.com/50Wliu/language-sourcepawn (Thanks 50Wliu)
